news.title: COVID-19 Patients Found to Have Signs of Lasting Immunity
news.summary: Some potentially good news amid a rather turbulent time: scientists are discovering that your immune system cells may be smart enough to store information about the coronavirus in order to fight it off again.

news.title: Coronavirus outbreak on Seattle fishing boat may offer insight into immunity
news.summary: A widespread coronavirus outbreak aboard a Seattle-based fishing boat may wield the first direct evidence that antibodies can offer protective immunity from the virus, according to a report on Tuesday.

news.title: The coronavirus outbreak on a Seattle fishing boat may offer glimpses into immunity
